author: Gabriel Rosenberg
title: Why to pay people to stay home: the history of livestock epidemics shows quarantine combined with financial incentives works best.
description: Why to pay people to stay home: the history of livestock epidemics shows quarantine combined with financial incentives works best. ↩︎ Washington Post View Post →
content:
In short, we should pay people to stay home and pay handsomely. Why? Because such a strategy works to stop an epidemic.
This vital object lesson comes to us from an unlikely source: the history of animal agriculture in the United States. In fact, the earlies… [+6860 chars]
